text: Martha Navarro (27 December 1937 - 30 December 2020) was a Mexican actress. She was born in Mexico City. Her career began in 1967. Navarro was known for her roles in El asesino se embarca, The Garden of Aunt Isabel and The Holy Office. She also appeared in many telenovelas. Navarro died on 30 December 2020 in Mexico City, just three days after her 83rd birthday.Muere otra primera actriz mexicana ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Actors from Mexico City
title: Martha Navarro
